state_summary: Bianca Cefalo founded Space DOTs, a company that detects space threats and provides insights on orbital threats. She raised $1.5 million seed round to expand her team and prepare technology for upcoming space missions.
evidence: Space DOTs launched in 2022 to detect space threats
The company has created a software platform called SKY-I for space tech manufacturers and operators
Cefalo spent decades in the industry, working on projects that have put objects on the moon and launched satellites into orbit
She found that industry politics and corporate bureaucracy were bottlenecks to progress
keywords: space threats, orbital threats, Space DOTs, Bianca Cefalo, SKY-I

metadata.investor_name: Female Founders Fund, Sie Ventures, Feel Ventures, General Electric Company
